name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked as spam and excluded. retardo: What a douche. (reported by zaratustra, davidadam, mrn)

name: bookofsand
text: For a five-year-old, Philippe writes a damn good Italian stereotype.

name: charchar
text: Italian people are nice!

name: jaldor
text: That's just a stereotype.

name: catachresis
text: Just the grossest image with the spider-bite there. Makes me shudder.

name: caduceo
text: A comment left by caduceo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, kenthegod, scraggg, SotiCoto)

name: qwerty
text: You and me both know that teodor was not looking at naked people for his art degree.

name: rogergs
text: Unless the class was "Painting the Ceiling 101"

name: treatyofparis
text: i mean it might be the green but hell if this isn't one of only a handful of comments that have made me laugh out loud.

name: fermatprime
text:
I initially read "green" to mean like the background of highly-chubbied comments.

I am Five.

name: spicyponyhead
text: I often laugh out loud at the green ones.

name: kotekan
text:
Michelangelo teaches that one, right?

(Ba-dump tish.)

name: redjoker
text: nice to see you ending with a rimshot. ( oh god did i really say that out loud?)

name: quinlaenar
text:
( oh god did i really say that out loud?) doesn't work nearly as well as (Ba-dump tish.). Just doesn't have the same flare to it.

(unlike this)

name: terribleman
text: It works well if you haven't said anything beforehand.

name: terriblerobot
text: "Jesus, did I say that? Or just think it? Was I talking? Did they hear me?"

name: jesler729
text:
I dunno if he was looking at that picture

I mean Phillipe might have just used it as an example of a naked person.

name: jesler729
text:
Oh god I spelled Philippe wrong

I KNEW THIS WOULD HAPPEN SOME DAY.

name: ford
text: My Mother knew that I would die one day.

name: fattypneumonia
text: She bought the wrong ketchup.

name: cracklewater
text: That young black male is none other than the BitchSeer!

name: changuitotuerto
text: I can't believe I am the first to chubby you for that catch. Here goes!

name: saint
text: Wait wait...is that the final word?

name: ssddr
text: thats a pretty damn good opera singer if you ask me

name: darthemed
text: This is the first time I have really noticed the header. Search bar, you and I have an appointment with "Friday Facts"!

name: _cheesekayke
text: Why in the hell are the Friday Facts always rated so low?! I have heard some people say they don't like them because they're not regular strips. In my opinion, they are the most consistently funny Achewood "feature" or running gag, including the blogs. I mean, this one got a 3.9!

name: heccibiggs
text: Tell me about it! Reading through the archive, everytime a Friday Facts comes up I'm like, "Awesome!", but I've come to expect it to be relatively low rated. I don't know why, they're always filled with Achewood GOLD, if you ask me.

name: mattylite
text: I also think they are awesome. In numbers we are strong.

name: clever-nickname
text:
"Pull-a over! Do-a the right thing! Why you gotta be-a so bad?"

Phillippe is a fucking genius.

GENIUS.

also i'm going to use the bomber in my boring AIM convos.

name: blastradius
text: why does phillipe's pig costume have a big thick head of hair? a mystery that shall never be answered, i suspect.

name: professorhazard
text: He seems to be dressed as Elzar for Halloween.

name: i_love_kate
text: Bam.

name: fattypneumonia
text: Looks like he lost the Lil' Emeril Eyebrow Kit , but ordered a Lil' Emeril Hair Kit as a replacement.

name: riazm
text: People are always lying about having a photographic memory, it is a peeve of mine.

name: falseprophet
text: Philippe is growing into a man of integrity. I don't think we need to worry about him.

name: anonymous44
text: my space-invaders tribute failed miserably

name: charchar
text: Like Hitler and his failed art career, Rocko too would crack under the weight of shattered dreams after his Space-Invaders emoticon- which he considered his masterpiece- was eaten by AssetBar.

name: invidious
text: Indeed.  For a second I thought you were attempting ASCII tentacle porn.

name: hcaz
text: Phillipe's Idiot emoticon looks like Lie Bot!

name: soticoto
text: Afro-boy makes this a 5.

name: dri-ft
text: Philippe is five.

name: tekende
text: I work in Garth Brooks's hometown. I have never seen him (unless he passed me in a hat and shades), but the Wal-Mart is hilarious. The music section has an absolutely insane amount of shelf space devoted to Garth Brooks CDs. And considering there are only about eight Brooks albums, it's pretty funny.

name: tellumo
text: Is this different from most Wal-Marts? I would think that they'd sell quite a few Garth Brooks CDs.

name: tekende
text: Yeah, I mean all Walmarts I've been to have a lot but nothing like this one. It is crazy.

name: dapooka
text: My favorite is that the developing story instantaneously has a sensational development.  If only other news organizations could be this efficient!

name: biznart
text: Since this is probably a regular occurrence for Lyle, I'm having a difficult time with "SENSATIONAL DEVELOPMENT".  If it was anyone but Philippe writing, I'd read that as sarcasm.  I'm so confused.

name: tripleg
text: is just so perfect. so so perfect

name: gmm
text: 5 for the alt text

name: rykan
text: Philippe's hair reminds me of the nake man's...

name: panamajack
text:
Lyle is SENSATIONAL; arrested DEVELOPMENT

At least, that's what my eyes saw.

name: adult_beverages
text:
I love beef's footnote: "he don't know too much stuff yet"

also how come Phillipe is into Nascar and country music?

name: coconut
text: I gave it a 5 for the pig costume

name: unprotected
text: Irking someone to the point of 43 stitches deserves jailtime, but also an award.

text: Irking someone to the point of 43 stitches deserves jailtime, but also an award.
